data.name: Simple BBCode Parser
data.description:
Your company is creating a Bulletin Board software. It is decided that BBCode will be used as main format. Your job is to write simple BBCode parser prototype. For those who don't know what BBCode is, here's wikipedia page: http://wikipedia.org/wiki/BBCode Your parser must: * Escape HTML tags found in specified input. * Not parse incomplete tags. * Convert newlines to `
` tag. * Accept list of tag names that should not be parsed. Notes: * You don't have to care about invalid tag order. * Generated tags that don't have ending tag should have space before `/>` (otherwise tests will fail) e.g. `
`, `` Tags that have to be supported are: * Basic text tags: `b i u s` * Image tag: `img` * Link tag(both variants): `url url=` Example calls: ```coffeescript parseBBCode("[b][i]text[/b][/i]") # should return "text" parseBBCode("[b][i]text[/b][/i]", ["i"]) # should return "[i]text[/i]" ``` Good luck and have fun!
